text: Thomas Hitzbleck (born 12 March 1947) is a German rower who represented West Germany. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City with the men's coxless four where they came sixth. Hitzbleck competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal with the men's coxed pair where they came eights. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:German male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of West Germany Category:Rowers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:People from Wilhelmshaven Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for West Germany Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Thomas Hitzbleck
